Night and day\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />I long to see you, so that I may be filled with joy. I remember your tears. \n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />I have been reminded of your genuine faith, which lived first in your grandmother Lois and your mother Eunice. And I am convinced that it lives in you also.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-06", "img": "", "lastvs": "7", "text": "  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />This is the reason I am reminding you to rekindle the gift of God in you through the laying on of my hands.\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />For God did not give us a spirit of fear, but of power and love and discipline.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-08", "img": "", "lastvs": "11", "text": "  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />So do not be ashamed of the testimony about our Lord, nor of me, Paul, his prisoner. Instead, share in suffering for the gospel according to the power of God.\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />It is God saved us and called us with a holy calling. He did this, not according to our works, but according to his own plan and grace. He gave us these things in Christ Jesus before times ever began.\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />But now God's salvation has been revealed by the appearing of our Savior Christ Jesus. It is Christ who put an end to death and brought life that never ends to light through the gospel.\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Because of this, I was appointed a preacher, an apostle, and a teacher.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-12", "img": "", "lastvs": "14", "text": "  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />For this cause I also suffer these things. But I am not ashamed, for I know him whom I have believed. I am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have entrusted to him until that day.\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />Keep the example of faithful messages that you heard from me, with the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus.\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />The good thing that God committed to you, guard it through the Holy Spirit, who lives in us.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "01-15", "img": "", "lastvs": "18", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />You know this, that all who live in Asia turned away from me. And all the ways he helped me in Ephesus, you know very well.</para>\n"}], "number": "01", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "02-01", "img": "", "lastvs": "2", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />You therefore, my child, be strengthened in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />And the things you heard from me among many witnesses, entrust them to faithful people who will be able to teach others also.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-03", "img": "", "lastvs": "5", "text": "  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />Suffer hardship with me, as a good soldier of Christ Jesus.\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />No soldier serves while entangled in the affairs of this life, so that he may please his superior officer.\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />Also, if someone competes as an athlete, he is not crowned unless he competes by the rules.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-06", "img": "", "lastvs": "7", "text": "  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />It is necessary that the hardworking farmer  receive his share of the crops first.\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />Think about what I am saying, for the Lord will give you understanding in everything.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-08", "img": "", "lastvs": "10", "text": "  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />Remember Jesus Christ, from David's seed, who was raised from the dead. This is according to my gospel message, \n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />for which I am suffering to the point of being chained as a criminal. But the word of God is not chained.\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />Therefore I endure all things for those who are chosen, so that they also may obtain the salvation that is in Christ Jesus, with eternal glory.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-11", "img": "", "lastvs": "13", "text": "  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />This saying is trustworthy:   </para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\"If we have died with him, we will also live with him.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\n\n<verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />If we endure, we will also reign with him.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">If we deny him, he also will deny us.</para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">\n\n<verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />if we are unfaithful, he remains faithful,  </para>\n\n<para style=\"q1\">for he cannot deny himself.\"</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-14", "img": "", "lastvs": "15", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />Keep reminding them of these things. Warn them before God not to quarrel about words. Because of this there is nothing useful. Because of this there is destruction for those who listen.\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />Do your best to present yourself approved to God as a workman without shame. Handle the word of truth correctly.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-16", "img": "", "lastvs": "18", "text": "  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />Avoid profane talk, which leads to more and more godlessness.\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />Their talk will spread like gangrene. Among whom are Hymenaeus and Philetus.\n\n  <verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />These are men who have missed the truth. They say that the resurrection has already happened. They overturn the faith of some. \n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-19", "img": "", "lastvs": "21", "text": "  <verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />However, the firm foundation of God stands. It has this inscription: \"The Lord knows those who are his\" and \"Everyone who names the name of the Lord must depart from unrighteousness.\"\n\n  <verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />In a wealthy home, there are not only containers of gold and silver. There are also containers of wood and clay. Some of these are for honorable use, and some for dishonorable.   \n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />If someone cleans himself from dishonorable use, he is an honorable container. He is set apart, useful to the Master, and prepared for every good work. \n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-22", "img": "", "lastvs": "23", "text": "  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />Flee youthful lusts. Pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace with those who call on the Lord out of a clean heart.\n\n  <verse number=\"23\" style=\"v\" />But refuse foolish and ignorant questions. You know that they give birth to arguments. \n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "02-24", "img": "", "lastvs": "26", "text": "  <verse number=\"24\" style=\"v\" />The Lord's servant must not quarrel. Instead he must be gentle toward all, able to teach, and patient.\n\n  <verse number=\"25\" style=\"v\" />He must in meekness educate those who oppose him. God may perhaps give them repentance for the knowledge of the truth.\n\n  <verse number=\"26\" style=\"v\" />They may become sober again and leave the devil's trap, after they have been captured by him for his will.</para>\n"}], "number": "02", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "03-01", "img": "", "lastvs": "4", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />But know this: in the last days there will be difficult times. \n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />For people will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, haughty, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, and unholy.\n\n  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />They will be without natural affection, implacable, slanderers, without self-control, violent, not lovers of good.\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />The will be betrayers, headstrong, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-05", "img": "", "lastvs": "7", "text": "  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />They will have a shape of godliness, but they will deny its power. Turn away from these people.\n\n  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />For some of them are men who enter into households and captivate foolish women. These are women who are heaped up with sins and are led away by various desires.\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />These women are always learning, but they are never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-08", "img": "", "lastvs": "9", "text": "  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />In the same way that Jannes and Jambres stood against Moses. In this way these false teachers also stand against the truth. They are men destroyed in mind, unapproved regarding the faith.\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />But they will not advance very far. For their foolishness will be obvious to all, just like that of those men.    \n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-10", "img": "", "lastvs": "13", "text": "  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />But as for you, you have followed my teaching, conduct, purpose, faith, longsuffering, love, patience,\n\n  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />persecutions, sufferings, and what happened to me at Antioch, at Iconium, and at Lystra. I endured  persecutions. Out of them all, the Lord rescued me.\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />All those who want to live in a godly manner in Christ Jesus will be persecuted. \n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />Evil people and impostors will go to even worse. They will lead others astray. They themselves are being led astray.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-14", "img": "", "lastvs": "15", "text": "  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />But as for you, remain in the things that you have learned and have firmly believed. You know from whom you have learned.\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />You know that from childhood you have known the sacred writings. These are able to make you wise for salvation through faith in Christ Jesus.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "03-16", "img": "", "lastvs": "17", "text": "  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />All scripture has been inspired by God. It is profitable for doctrine, for conviction, for correction, and for training in righteousness.\n\n  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />This is so that the man of God may be competent, equipped for every good work.</para>\n"}], "number": "03", "ref": "", "title": ""}, {"frames": [{"format": "usx", "id": "04-01", "img": "", "lastvs": "2", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"1\" style=\"v\" />I give this solemn command before God and Christ Jesus, who will judge the living and the dead, and because of his appearing and his kingdom:\n\n  <verse number=\"2\" style=\"v\" />Preach the Word. Be ready when it is convenient and when it is not. Reprove, rebuke, exhort, with all patience and teaching.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-03", "img": "", "lastvs": "5", "text": "  <verse number=\"3\" style=\"v\" />For the time will come when people will not endure sound teaching. Instead, they will heap up for themselves teachers according to their own desires. They will be tickling their hearing.\n\n  <verse number=\"4\" style=\"v\" />They will turn their hearing away from the truth, and they will turn aside to myths.\n\n  <verse number=\"5\" style=\"v\" />But you, be sober-minded in all things. Suffer hardship; do the work of an evangelist; fulfill your service.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-06", "img": "", "lastvs": "8", "text": "  <verse number=\"6\" style=\"v\" />For I am already being poured out. The time of my departure has come.\n\n  <verse number=\"7\" style=\"v\" />I have competed in the good contest; I have finished the race; I have kept the faith.\n\n  <verse number=\"8\" style=\"v\" />The crown of righteousness has been reserved for me, which the Lord, the righteous judge, will give to me on that day. And not to me only, but also to all those who have loved his appearing.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-09", "img": "", "lastvs": "10", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"9\" style=\"v\" />Do your best to come to me quickly.\n\n  <verse number=\"10\" style=\"v\" />For Demas has left me. He loves this present world and has gone to Thessalonica. Crescens went to Galatia, and Titus went to Dalmatia.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-11", "img": "", "lastvs": "13", "text": "  <verse number=\"11\" style=\"v\" />Only Luke is with me. Get Mark and bring him with you because he is useful to me in the work.\n\n  <verse number=\"12\" style=\"v\" />Tychicus I sent to Ephesus.\n\n  <verse number=\"13\" style=\"v\" />The cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus, bring it when you come, and the books, especially the parchments.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-14", "img": "", "lastvs": "16", "text": "  <verse number=\"14\" style=\"v\" />Alexander the coppersmith displayed many evil deeds against me. The Lord will repay to him according to his deeds.\n\n  <verse number=\"15\" style=\"v\" />You also should guard yourself against him, because he greatly opposed our words.\n\n  <verse number=\"16\" style=\"v\" />At my first defense, no one stood with me. Instead, everyone left me. May it not be counted against them.\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-17", "img": "", "lastvs": "18", "text": "  <verse number=\"17\" style=\"v\" />But the Lord stood by me and strengthened me so that, through me, the proclamation might be fully fulfilled, and that all the Gentiles might hear. I was rescued out of the lion's mouth.\n\n  <verse number=\"18\" style=\"v\" />The Lord will rescue me from every evil deed and will save me for his heavenly kingdom. To him be the glory forever and ever. Amen.</para>\n"}, {"format": "usx", "id": "04-00", "img": "", "lastvs": "22", "text": "<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"19\" style=\"v\" />Greet Priscilla, Aquila, and the house of Onesiphorus.\n\n  <verse number=\"20\" style=\"v\" />Erastus remained at Corinth, but Trophimus I left sick at Miletus.\n\n  <verse number=\"21\" style=\"v\" />Do your best to come before winter. Eubulus greets you, also Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers.</para>\n\n<para style=\"p\">\n\n  <verse number=\"22\" style=\"v\" />May the Lord be with your spirit.
